Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: inhibits bacterial protein biosynthesis by preventing the formation of a stable complex between the elongation factor Tu (EF-Tu), GTP and tRNA, hindering the activation of EF-Tu.
